entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
